title: Google | L3
content:

Years of Experience: 3.5
Current Org: SDE2 in MNC
Cuurent Compensation: (45 lpa)
Date of the Offer: June 24
Title/Level: L3 (downleveled from L4)
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 23L
Relocation: Nil
Stock bonus: USD 45K (4 years, 38-33-17-12)
Variable Bonus: 15% of base
Joining Bonus: INR 2L
Total comp: ~ 39L (incl bonus)

My recruiter forwarded my application to the Hiring Committee (HC) prior to the team match due to the positive feedback I received from my interviews. Unfortunately, the HC downgraded my candidacy. The situation might have been different had I received a SOS from the Hiring Manager. 

I rejected the offer due to downlevel and the offered compensation was lower than my current total compensation.
